name: WorkAssistantbyWhenToWork
0:
”Alexa open Work Assistant”
”When is my next shift”
”Who else is working today”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: work assistant
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Work Assistant by WhenToWork skill for Amazon Alexa allows you to ask Alexa for real time information from WhenToWork such as when your next shift or time off occurs or send and receive WhenToWork messages. Also, you can receive optional notifications on your Alexa devices regarding activity on your WhenToWork account, such as time off approvals and work schedule changes.

Before adding this skill, you should already be a user of WhenToWork. The easiest way add this skill is to use the WhenToWork desktop browser application on the employee's INFO tab, or use the WhenToWork mobile app under My Info & Settings -> Smart Assistants. Both of these methods combine the enabling and the account linking steps into one continuous action for simplicity. Alternately, you can add this skill using the Amazon companion app by searching for the skill named "work assistant", or just say "Alexa, open work assistant" from any of your Alexa devices, but this will require additional steps to link your WhenToWork account to Alexa. In either case, Work Assistant will provide instructions along the way to complete the setup. 

After your account setup is complete, just say "help" from within your Work Assistant session for a summary of things you can do.
